| Quotation               = The '''Mecha Undeground''' is a nontrivially '''dysfunctional''' freakshow... Populated by improvised '''uploads,''' homebrewed '''hiveminds,''' self-modded '''war machines,''' and technovirus-mutated '''renegade prototypes.''' Thus, it's not '''entirely''' surprising that most of them are '''on drugs.'''
| Speaker                 = [[Tony Stark 2.0 (Earth-616)|Iron Man 2.0]]
| QuoteSource             = Iron Man: Hypervelocity Vol 1 4

| HistoryText             = The Mecha Underground is a commmunity of "mecha-supremacists." [[Tony Stark 2.0 (Earth-616)|Tony Stark 2.0]] infiltrated one of their underwater parties aboard a sunken ship to locate the manufacturer of a railgun used to attack the original [[Iron Man (Anthony "Tony" Stark)|Tony Stark]].{{r|Iron Man: Hypervelocity Vol 1 3}}

Once he infiltrated the party using chameleonware to disguise himself as a generic robot, Iron Man 2.0 located the manufacturer, a weapon-designing robosavant known as "Miltech Muramasa." Almost immdediatelly, the program that had infiltrated Iron Man 2.0's system known as [[Absynthe (Earth-616)|Absynthe]] used a secret command hidden in the software the mechas used as drugs to transform them into puppets and attack him, forcing Tony 2.0 to exfiltrate.{{r|Iron Man: Hypervelocity Vol 1 4}}
